name: barricade
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a line or pile of objects put together, often quickly, to stop people from going where they want to go: A few protestors broke through police barricades and rushed toward the site.erect a barricade Inmates erected a barricade between themselves and the prison guards. See also
